name: joanrodas/plubo
description: A Simple and fast WP Plugin Boilerplate.

post-create-project-cmd: command -v pb-cli >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo '' || { echo 'Downloading and installing plubo-cli...'; wget -qO- https://github.com/joanrodas/plubo-cli/releases/download/v0.1.6/plubo-cli_Linux_x86_64.tar.gz | tar -xvz; chmod +x plubo-cli; ./plubo-cli namespace-project; }
